price: (7) And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allāh will resurrect those in the graves.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡعَثُ مَن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-sāʿata ātiyatun lā rayba fīhā wa-anna al-laha yabʿathu man fī al-qubūri
